title: Balance of Power
description: The whole world will be watching a man, a woman and a buzzer! Are you ready for the final gender challenge?
quote: Who secretly wishes they were married to a hot, sexy lesbian?
altHero: a man and a woman sit on a game show stage with a host in front of them
alt1: Meredith Vieira on the game show set
alt2: the woman hits a red buzzer
alt4: Vieira points at the woman with Tara! written on her prompter
